mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (id, username, realname, password, email, phone, role, job, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, enabled) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT})
